SELECT N_XH, FUN_GET_WZLB(N_LBXH) N_LBXH, C_BT, C_LJ, TO_CHAR(D_DJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') D_DJ, NVL(N_XSXH,'') N_XSXH FROM B_CYWZ WHERE N_LBXH=#{n_lbxh} ORDER BY N_XSXH
